name: MAR_EDIT_DOSE_PARAM_TYPE
description: Stores the edit history of the parameter type for one dosing parameter line in the dosing parameter group of one administration line.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.
